name: EX Drones BETA 2
description:
EX Drones Beta Is An Fps- Adventure Sci-FY, the game is beta and you may notice some bugs, please report them to fix them, we will updating the game as fast as we can.

WHAT CHANGES DOES BETA 2 HAVE?

-NEW LEVEL AVAILABLE 

-MORE ENEMIES ADDED

-OBJECTIVE FIND THE COOKIES IS NOW AVAILABLE

-FULLSCREEN MODE IS ON

THANKS FOR PLAYING EX Drones BETA 2
